{{wikipedia|Siming}}
===Etymology===
Originally named by [[w:Koxinga|Koxinga]] during the [[w:Southern Ming|Southern Ming]] resistance to the [[w:Qing Empire|Qing Empire]].

===Pronunciation===

===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# {{lb|zh|historical|_|geography}} [[Siming]] (思明[[州]]), a [[former]] [[name]] of [[Xiamen]] ([[厦門]]) in [[Fujian]], [[China]], during its [[occupation]] by [[Southern Ming]] [[force]]s in the 1650s.
# {{lb|zh|historical|_|geography}} [[Siming]] [[prefecture|Prefecture]] (思明[[州]]), the [[hinterland]] [[control]]ed from [[Southern Ming|Southern-Ming]] [[Xiamen]].
# {{lb|zh|historical|_|geography}} [[Siming]] [[county|County]] (思明[[縣]]), the [[county]] of [[Fujian]] around [[Xiamen]] under [[Republic of China|Republican]] [[rule]].
# {{lb|zh|geography}} [[Siming]] [[district|District]] (思明[[區]]), an [[urban]] [[district]] of [[Xiamen]].
# {{lb|zh|historical|_|geography}} [[Siming]] [[subdistrict|Subdistrict]] (思明[[街道]]), a [[former]] [[subdistrict]] of [[Siming]] [[district|District]] in [[Xiamen]].
